MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Chemistry | b: Biology | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Photosynthesis | c: Mitosis | d: Osmosis

MCQ: What is the basic unit of life that processes hereditary information?
Choices: a: Atoms | b: Molecules | c: Cells | d: Organs

MCQ: Which process allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce?
Choices: a: Photosynthesis | b: Respiration | c: Fermentation | d: Transpiration

MCQ: What is the age of life on Earth according to the text?
Choices: a: 1 million years ago | b: 10 million years ago | c: 1 billion years ago | d: 3.7 billion years ago
